title: Choice
description: A set of choices (can be html code or bandits) with values. The participant is asked to choose an option by clicking on it.

title: Choice
description: A set of choices (can be html code or bandits) with values. The participant is asked to choose an option by clicking on it.

title: Foraging
description:
A stimulus where multiple items are displayed on screen some of which are targets that are collected by clicking on
them. The other items are distractors that should be ignored. The task ends when all targets are collected or when a
time limit is reached.

title: Random Object Kinematogram
description: Display moving and orientated objects (such as triangles).

title: RSVP
description: Display a series of stimuli in rapid succession with target stimuli embedded in the series.

title: Survey
description: Display a survey to the user.
